#include <cstdio>

{304332437,566697834,139838741,41465187,139838741,164493696,426859093,380893856,426859093,712979655,737634610,763587842,0,0,0,252824185}};
 
char read_char()
{
if(bufferbegin==buffersize)
{
buffersize=fread(buffer,sizeof(char),300000,stdin);
bufferbegin=0;
}
return buffer[bufferbegin++];
}
 
int64 read_int64()
{
int64 ans=0;
char ch=read_char();
while(ch<'0'||ch>'9')ch=read_char();
for(;ch>='0'&&ch<='9';ch=read_char())ans=(ans<<3)+(ans<<1)+(ch-'0');
return ans;
}
 
void power(int64 n)
{
int64 r1=8,r2=3,r3=1,r4=4;
int64 ans1,ans2,ans3,ans4;
int x=0;
while(n)
{
ans1=r1,ans2=r2,ans3=r3,ans4=r4;
if(n&1)
{
r1=(save[x][0]*ans1+save[x][1]*ans2+save[x][2]*ans3+save[x][3]*ans4)%MOD;
r2=(save[x][4]*ans1+save[x][5]*ans2+save[x][6]*ans3+save[x][7]*ans4)%MOD;
r3=(save[x][8]*ans1+save[x][9]*ans2+save[x][10]*ans3+save[x][11]*ans4)%MOD;
r4=(save[x][12]*ans1+save[x][13]*ans2+save[x][14]*ans3+save[x][15]*ans4)%MOD;
}
n>>=1;
++x;
}
printf("%d\n",r1);
}
 
void init()
{
a[0][0]=1;a[0][1]=1;a[0][2]=1;a[0][3]=2;
a[1][0]=1;a[1][1]=0;a[1][2]=0;a[1][3]=0;
a[2][0]=0;a[2][1]=1;a[2][2]=0;a[2][3]=0;
a[3][0]=0;a[3][1]=0;a[3][2]=0;a[3][3]=2;
}
 
int main()
{
int T,t=0;int64 N;
for(T=read_int64();t<T;++t)
{
N=read_int64();
if(N<3){printf("0\n");continue;}
else if(N==3){printf("1\n");continue;}
else if(N==4){printf("3\n");continue;}
else if(N==5){printf("8\n");continue;}
else
{
//init();
power(N-5);
//long long ans=(c[0][0]*8+c[0][1]*3+c[0][2]+c[0][3]*4)%MOD;
//printf("%d\n",ans);
}
}
return 0;
}
